mapper.sql: t.id, t.fid, t.template_component_id, t.origin_identify, t.field_name, t.is_allow_signed_up, t.is_config_on_activity
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_sign_up_condition ( template_component_id, fid, origin_identify, field_name, is_allow_signed_up, is_config_on_activity ) VALUES
( #{value.templateComponentId}, #{value.fid}, #{value.originIdentify}, #{value.fieldName}, #{value.allowSignedUp}, #{value.configOnActivity} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.template_component_id FROM t_sign_up_condition t LEFT JOIN t_template_component t1 on t.template_component_id = t1.id and t1.template_id = #{templateId}
select t.* FROM t_sign_up_condition t INNER JOIN t_sign_up_condition_enable t1 ON t.template_component_id = t1.template_component_id AND t1.activity_id = #{activityId}
